summary:
Some of Unique Effects (4) for weapons
New: Keening, Dawnbreaker, Windshear with description, Mehrune\'s Razor & Voice Elemental Fury
Old: Ebony Blade w/o description, Dawnbreaker, Windshear w/o description & Mehrune\'s Razor
descriptionHtml:
Mod install as all other *.esp

new: Added new .esp with skyforge weapons included effects from Unique weapons & 1 Voice
To learn Effects just buy Skyforge items from.. you know where from :)

Note #0: Valdr\'s dagger have Perk effect - still noway to learn =)

old: To learn Effects to enchant your own weapon needed console, type player.additem id and quantity (i think 1 will be enough :) ), after - learn as usual you do it =) After learn - save, quit game, delete mod file, enjoy new enchanting effects ^^

Unique Effects for weapons:
Ebony Blade - player.additem 28de0 1
Dawnbreaker - player.additem 28e83 1
Windshear - player.additem 28fdd 1
Mehrune\'s Razor - player.additem 1e022 1

Note #0: Ebony Blade Effect & Windshear have no description :) Not my fault i think ))
Note #1: Daedric Enchanted Weapon used in mod
Note #2: You can learn most Effects from unique armor - but you cannot enchant with this Effects any type of your own armor, forget it & don\'t ask me, or ask someone who know how to do it correctly =)
Note #3: Vald\'r Lucky Dagger Effect noway to learn cause no EITM data, same as 2 - ask everybody, not me :)
author: baka

files.name: Skyforge Weapons To Learn Enchants
files.changelogHtml:
change items with effects to learn to skyforge weapons
added keening & elemental fury effect
fixed to another windshear effect
removed ebony blade effect
